channel.title: Traffic Scotland - Current Incidents
channel.description: Current incidents on the road network e.g. accidents

item.title: A9000 Forth Road Bridge - Closed to high vehicles
item.description: The A9000 (Forth Road Bridge) is closed to High sided vehicles due to high winds affecting driving conditions.

item.title: A78 A8 Greenock - B788 Larkfield - Closure
item.description: The A78 is closed southbound from the South Street Roundabout in Greenock due to a unsafe building. Motorists are advised to use alternative route and expect longer than normal journey times.

item.title: A87 Skye Bridge - Closed to high vehicles
item.description: The A87 Skye Bridge is closed to High Sided Vehicles due to high winds affecting driving conditions.

item.title: M898 Erskine Bridge approach M8 J30 - M898 J1 - High winds
item.description: Road users are advised to use caution crossing the A898 Erskine Bridge due to high winds currently affecting driving conditions.

item.title: A876 Kilbagie Roundabout - Higgins Neuk Roundabout - High winds
item.description: Road users are advised to use caution crossing the A876 (Clackmannanshire Bridge) due to high winds currently affecting driving conditions.

item.title: M90 J1b Ferrytoll - J1a Queensferry - High winds
item.description: Road users are advised to use caution crossing the M90 Queensferry Crossing due to high winds currently affecting driving conditions.

item.title: M9 Dumbarton road - J9 (Bannockburn) - Flooding
item.description: M9 between junction 9-10 is currently restricted westbound due to flooding. Drivers are advised to use caution on approach and plan for longer than normal journey times.

item.title: A92 Tay Road Bridge - Open to cars only
item.description: The A92 Tay Road Bridge is open to cars only due to high winds affecting driving conditions.
